send-fail: Oops, there is something wrong. The message cannot be broadcasted. Please try again.
send-success: The message has been successfully broadcasted.
send-description: Enter your phone number associated with your account and we will send you an one-time password code to confirm
login-description: Please enter the one-time password sent to your number
number-not-found: Sorry, the number cannot be found.
image-description: Only *.jpeg and *.png images will be accepted. Size limited to 10MB
confirmation-body: Do you want to send this message?
fetch-users-error: Oops, something is wrong. Please try again!
create-fail: Oops, there's an error. User cannot be created.
edit-fail: Oops, there's an error. Changes cannot be saved.
delete-fail: Oops, there's an error. User cannot be deleted.
delete-confirm-message: Are you sure you want to delete?
